definition: to meet with a refusal (e.g. visa)/to have an application rejected
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident

sentences.english: Galaxy investment new drama "if love you" invited to join Chen rejected.
sentences.chinese: 银河投资的新剧《假如爱你》力邀陈超加盟遭拒。

sentences.english: New ideas tend to be partly-formed so it is easy to reject them as ‘bad’.
sentences.chinese: 新的想法往往不够完善，很容易因“差”遭拒。

definition: to fail to eventuate/(verb suffix) to be unsuccessful in ...ing
to tactfully decline/to turn down gracefully
in a fit of pique/in a fury
to refuse to accept a payment/to refuse to pay/to stop (a check or payment)
to drop in/to visit/to lock a door/(of a shop) to close/to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
to fizzle out/to come to nothing
